mapper.sql: id, user_id, asset_id, asset_type, is_collection, is_dispose

id,
user_id,
asset_id,
asset_type,
is_collection,
is_dispose,

mapper.update:
update t_asset_user_re
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
asset_id = #{assetId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
asset_type = #{assetType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_collection = #{isCollection,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_dispose = #{isDispose,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_asset_user_re set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, asset_id = #{assetId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, asset_type = #{assetType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_collection = #{isCollection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_dispose = #{isDispose,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT aur.*,tap.asset_no assetNo,tap.title,tap.total_money totalMoney,DATE_FORMAT(tap.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') endTime,DATE_FORMAT(tap.update_time ,'%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime, dis.dispose_type,dis.alg,dis.value FROM t_asset_user_re aur LEFT JOIN t_asset_package tap ON tap.id=aur.asset_id LEFT JOIN t_dispose dis ON dis.asset_id=tap.id WHERE tap.stateflag=0 AND aur.asset_type=16 AND dis.asset_type=16
UNION SELECT aur.*,tap.no assetNo,tap.title,tap.asset_rental totalMoney,DATE_FORMAT(tap.entrust_endtime,'%Y-%m-%d') endTime,DATE_FORMAT(tap.update_time ,'%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime, dis.dispose_type,dis.alg,dis.value FROM t_asset_user_re aur LEFT JOIN t_fixed_asset tap ON tap.id=aur.asset_id LEFT JOIN t_dispose dis ON dis.asset_id=tap.id WHERE tap.stateflag=0 AND aur.asset_type=10 AND dis.asset_type=10
UNION SELECT aur.*,tap.bond_no assetNo,tap.title,tap.total_money totalMoney,DATE_FORMAT(tap.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') endTime,DATE_FORMAT(tap.update_time ,'%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime, dis.dispose_type,dis.alg,dis.value FROM t_asset_user_re aur LEFT JOIN t_user_bond tap ON tap.id=aur.asset_id LEFT JOIN t_dispose dis ON dis.asset_id=tap.id WHERE tap.stateflag=0 AND aur.asset_type IN (11,12,13) AND dis.asset_type IN (11,12,13)
Limit #{startPage},#{pageCount}
